summary: An apprentice train dispatcher at a village station seeks his first sexual encounter and becomes despondent when he is unable to perform.
cast: Václav Neckár|Josef Somr|Vlastimil Brodský|Vladimír Valenta|Alois Vachek|Ferdinand Kruta|Jitka Scoffin|Jitka Zelenohorská|Nada Urbánková|Libuse Havelková|Kveta Fialová|Pavla Marsálková|Milada Jezková|Zuzana Minichova|Václav Fiser|Karel Hovorka|Jirí Kodet|Frantisek Husák|Dagmar Zikánová|Jan Kotva|Antonin Prazak|Emil Iserle|Vladimír Hrabánek|Frantisek Marek|Miroslav Barták|Jaroslav Toms|Miloslav Homola|Josef Vondrácek|Jana Hana Duffková|Vratislav Blazek|Milon Novotny|Jirí Hálek|Bohumil Koska|Václav Kotva|Pavel Landovský|Jirí Menzel
title: Trenes rigurosamente vigilados
